title: 185. Katherine Firkin: Sticks and Stones
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary: Dani Vee chats to Katherine Firkin about her debut novel Sticks and Stones. They chat about crime fiction, the writing process and writing about dark things. An excellent chat for crime thriller lovers.
